column1: Uchi////Dinner at Uchi is definitely an enjoyable
column3: and pricey experience. Though at a resturant like Uchi
column4: it's expected to spend quite a bit
column5: I can't say the food was good enough to warrant comnig back for the regularly priced menu. I am curious about their omakase and other fixed menus
column6: but outside of the Sake Social
column7: I wouldn't reccomend Uchi for the price. However
column8: I am eager to return in the future and sample more of their menu. 4 stars.
